info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 5 at 2:11PM PDT until May 5 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave and southern Nevada, including the following county, Clark.
* WHEN...Until 615 PM PDT /615 PM MST/.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry washes.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 211 PM PDT /211 PM MST/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Boulder City, Las Vegas Bay, The Motor Speedway, Lake Las Vegas, Overton, Nellis AFB, Moapa Town, East Las Vegas, Sam Boyd Stadium, Moapa Valley, Callville Bay Campground, Callville Bay, Valley Of Fire, Las Vegas Bay Campground, Echo Bay Campground, Echo Bay and Boulder Beach. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM PDT /615 PM MST/ THIS EVENING
